item.title: Marvel Rivals Season 2 Confirms Emma Frost and Ultron
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/marvel-rivals-season-2-confirms-emma-frost-and-ultron/

Marvel Rivals Season 2: Hellfire Gala has been revealed, confirming the arrival of two new characters, Emma Frost and Ultron. 

Marvel Rival Season 2: Hellfire Gala begins on April 11, 2025, and the new trailer provides players with details on what to expect. Emma Frost has invited all Marvel Rivals characters to the island of Krakoa, so mutant rivals and friends can work together to share a better future. However, Ultron has different plans and invades the peaceful time Marvel Rivals characters are having during Emma Frost’s party. 

Emma Frost and Ultron Arrive for Marvel Rivals Season 2

The Marvel Rival Season 2: Hellfire Gala trailer begins with characters like Magneto, Wolverine, Star Lord, Black Panther and more pulling up on a red carpet with their flashiest outfits (some new skin teases), clicking pictures, interacting with each other and having a great time. However, as soon as Emma Frost starts delivering a toast, she is interrupted by an invasion from Ultron’s army, and the Marvel Rivals roster has to join hands to take down a common enemy. More details about the upcoming season should be revealed closer to release, including new characters, maps, cosmetics and more.

Emma Frost and Ultron were leaked for Marvel Rivals a few months ago. Emma Frost was expected to arrive with a whole set of X-Men characters, including Professor X, Gambit, Nightcrawler, and more. Ultron, on the other hand, was leaked along with the Thing. He is expected to be a support character with different healing abilities for the team. 

In other news, Marvel Rival’s Venom Twerking emote is now live. Also, check out the upcoming one-shot comic, Ignite, inspired by the hero-shooter. What are your thoughts on Emma Frost and Ultron joining Marvel Rivals? Let us know in the comments or on our community forum!

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about GTA 5 returning to Xbox Game Pass this month. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
